verses.verse: And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> to <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and to all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, that they should <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>.

But <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H2654>delighted<s%> <S%H3966>much<s%> in <S%H1732>David<s%>: and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7586>Saul<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> thee: now therefore, I pray thee, take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to thyself until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H3427>abide<s%> in a <S%H5643>secret<s%> place, and <S%H2244>hide<s%> thyself:

And I will go <S%H3318>out<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H3027>beside<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> where thou art, and I will <S%H1696>commune<s%> with my <S%H1>father<s%> of thee; and <S%H4100>what<s%> I <S%H7200>see<s%>, that I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee.

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Let not the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> against his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, against <S%H1732>David<s%>; because he hath not <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee, and because his <S%H4639>works<s%> have been to thee-ward <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>:

For he did <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%> in his <S%H3709>hand<s%>, and <S%H5221>slew<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>wrought<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: thou <S%H7200>sawest<s%> it, and didst <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>: wherefore then wilt thou <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, to <S%H4191>slay<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> without a <S%H2600>cause<s%>?

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>: and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%>, As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, he shall <S%H518>not<s%> be <S%H4191>slain<s%>.

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5046>shewed<s%> him all those <S%H1697>things<s%>. And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and he was in his <S%H6440>presence<s%>, as in times <S%H865>past<s%> <S%H8032><s%>. in times: Heb. yesterday, third day

And there was <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H5221>slew<s%> them with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>; and they <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> him. him: Heb. his face

And the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was upon <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, as he <S%H3427>sat<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%> with his <S%H2595>javelin<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5059>played<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> even to the <S%H7023>wall<s%> with the <S%H2595>javelin<s%>; but he slipped <S%H6362>away<s%> out of <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H6440>presence<s%>, and he <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H2595>javelin<s%> into the <S%H7023>wall<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and <S%H4422>escaped<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%>.

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> also <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> unto <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, to <S%H8104>watch<s%> him, and to <S%H4191>slay<s%> him in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>: and <S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If thou <S%H4422>save<s%> not thy <S%H5315>life<s%> to <S%H3915>night<s%>, to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> thou shalt be <S%H4191>slain<s%>.
So <S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H3381>let<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> through a <S%H2474>window<s%>: and he <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H1272>fled<s%>, and <S%H4422>escaped<s%>.

And <S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> an <S%H8655>image<s%>, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it in the <S%H4296>bed<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H3523>pillow<s%> of <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair for his <S%H4763>bolster<s%>, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> it with a <S%H899>cloth<s%>. image: Heb. teraphim
And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, she <S%H559>said<s%>, He is <S%H2470>sick<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> again to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Bring him <S%H5927>up<s%> to me in the <S%H4296>bed<s%>, that I may <S%H4191>slay<s%> him.

And when the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> were come <S%H935>in<s%>, behold, there was an <S%H8655>image<s%> in the <S%H4296>bed<s%>, with a <S%H3523>pillow<s%> of <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair for his <S%H4763>bolster<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4324>Michal<s%>, Why hast thou deceived me <S%H7411>so<s%>, and sent <S%H7971>away<s%> mine <S%H341>enemy<s%>, that he is <S%H4422>escaped<s%>? And <S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, He <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Let me <S%H7971>go<s%>; why should I <S%H4191>kill<s%> thee?

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%>, and <S%H4422>escaped<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> him all that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to him. And he and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H5121>Naioth<s%>.
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Behold, <S%H1732>David<s%> is at <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>: and when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H3862>company<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesying<s%>, and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> as <S%H5324>appointed<s%> over them, the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was upon the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and they also <S%H5012>prophesied<s%>.

And when it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%>, and they <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> likewise. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> time, and they <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> also.

Then <S%H3212>went<s%> he also to <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H953>well<s%> that is in <S%H7906>Sechu<s%>: and he <S%H7592>asked<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H375>Where<s%> are <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%>? And one <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, they be at <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>.

And he <S%H3212>went<s%> thither to <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>: and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was upon him also, and he <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H1980>on<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesied<s%>, until he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>.

And he stripped <S%H6584>off<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> in like manner, and lay <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> all that <S%H3117>day<s%> and all that <S%H3915>night<s%>. Wherefore they <S%H559>say<s%>, Is <S%H7586>Saul<s%> also among the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>? lay: Heb. fell
